//: Monsters that doesn't spawn directly in cities and has no upgrade paths (except the stray zombie). Rarely spawns in the wilds, in some parts of cities and/or other special conditions.
description: A morbidly large zombie heavily mutated from long exposure to irradiated waters, which altered most of its body parts into something, like that of a mollusk. Sluggish, yet full of surprises.

special_attacks.monster_message: <color_yellow>%1$s submerges and generates a seismic wave towards %3$s</color>!

description: A squidling, or some sort of maggot, but with tentacles. Tiny, feeble and short-lived, it seeks a lively host on its ways to attach to.

//: Support-type zed that uses an aura to inflict debuffs.
description: A skinny tall zombie with swollen mouth and elongated jaws, seeping with black ooze. Its harsh, high-pitched voice makes it suprisingly dangerous.

//: Summoner-type electric zed. Uses an aura to spawn minions.
description: A pale corpse, obscure to its appearance. Flowing through its body is an immensive electric current.
An electric crackling ball, floating freely in the air.
A large, electric crackling ball, floating freely in the air.

//: Aggro-type zed that morphs into a lethal counterpart. It uses a spell for this so it might not work, especially when in crowded surroundings.
description: A human body, swaying as it moves, an unstoppable rage visible in its oily red eyes.
Heaps of greenish flesh has replaced the head under its undulating bulbous torso. Slow and is heavily hampered, yet it opposes a big threat for its corrosive bodily fluids.
A human body, swaying as it moves, an unstoppable rage visible in its oily red eyes.
A large, wickedly vile corpse, with writhing tendrils under its foul mouth. Veins glow brighter as its raging desire for flesh sets it ablazed.

//: Specialized summoner. Slim chance to call a zed of random type using its aura, but becomes frequent when a target is in sight.
description: Shrouded in ominous black mist, this corpse's horrid visage strikes fear to the minds of the conscious ones.

special_attacks.monster_message: <color_yellow>%1$s curses the surrounding area as it enshrouds itself in shadows!</color>

//: Support-type zed. Becomes a worn item, bringing movement debuffs that lasts until it is removed. Its ability only affects the player, and nothing else. If it does the ability on something, the item is transferred onto you, no matter how far you are.
description: Covered in foul stench, this ambiguously dreadful 4-legged creature dangles as it moves, grasping and gnawing anything in its surroundings.

//: Aggro-type zed. Like a shady zombie, but much stronger and tougher with chained abilities.
description: Concealed in otherworldly shadows, this vicious corpse brings terror to its unfortunate prey. Sets of razor nails glow faintly in the darkness, and baneful eyes affixed to the void.

special_attacks.monster_message: <color_yellow>Errant shadows emerges from %1$s as they perform an onslaught!</color>

//: Support-type zed that uses an aura to cause fear to the targets.
description: A hollow corpse, suffering from severe deterioration of flesh that made it appear completely skeletal. Its ghastly visage is uncomfortable to the sight, and being near it is the worst than most.

//: Support-type zed aberration that heals nearby allies. It uses its own health to perform healing spells.
description: A gigantic mound of putrid flesh, with assortments of limbs and writhing tendrils reemerging back and forth. Dark, oozing pus constantly erupts in its swollen body.

//: Summoner-type monster whose purpose is to send out minions using field emissions. Its basically a 3-tile wide monster: the center is its hitbox and the adjacent `mouth` causes damage when a creature steps on it.
description: An eerie pit composed mostly of decaying flesh, with a distinctive huge gap revealing thousands of bones and other organic materials aligned in its wall. Thick, sinewy webbing supports a central bulbous orb that beats at a steady rate.

special_attacks.monster_message:
<color_red>You feel the ground shaking as it originates from %1$s!</color>
<color_yellow>%1$s sends a defeaning screech!</color>

//: Gorepit's main damage dealer.
description: A stout, meandering tendril, consisting of flesh and bones. Its vein glows in sync with the orb.

//: Aggro-type zed, both durable and lethal. Unlike other zed mutants, this one's very dependant on healing for itself whilst dealing damage, in addition to its unique debuff-inflicting acid.
description: A colossal, humanoid corpse, distinct to its seemingly volatile, torsal lump, a headless top and a set of arm biters with swollen eyes united into them. Drools corrupted acid, its great desire for flesh has sent its hunger beyond limitations, thus reaping and feasting upon its fellow undeads has became its norm.

//: Aggro-type zed aberration, extremely tough, durable and full of deadly ranged capabilities, unique to its drastic movement speed gain as long as it sees a target. One of the true end-game monsters.
description: A massive conglomeration of thick, gangrenous flesh, forming a snake-like figurine with its head resembling a dragon. Terrifyingly disastrous, its entire body is covered in bony scales and lies under it are spikes of similar material. Yet its great lack of intuitive perception causes it to easily become enraged by the time it senses a prey.

special_attacks.monster_message: <color_yellow>%1$s's rage intensifies as it glares at %3$s!</color>

//: Support-type zed who weakens the target by applying debuffs that intensifies for as long as it acquire LOS, while randomly strengthens nearby allies. Feeble, yet a great nuisance behind its meat wall. One of the true end-game monsters.
description: A grotesquely baneful corpse, resonating pure dread in the air as it eagerly sways along its path. Visceral tendrils slither freely in its vicinity, acting like guides in sensing the unfortunate host.

special_attacks.monster_message: <color_yellow>%1$s's visceral tendril undulates while it is attached to %3$s!</color>

//: Summoner-type monster that excels at quickly sending out agile minions. One of the true end-game monsters.
description: An overwhelming mass of flesh resembling a brain, constantly excreting vaporized poison gas originating from its protruding shroom-like outgrowths. Large, hollow gaps reveal nothing but shady gloom. However, when observed closely, harsh screeches are heard indistinctly.

special_attacks.monster_message: <color_yellow>Twisted abominations starts to crawl out of %1$s!</color>

//: Four types of crawlies the equinox will actively spawns. These crawlies are vulnerable, yet a great threat to their paralizing debuffs
description: A mutated lump of necrotic flesh, horribly twisted into a spindy creature. Its limbs are tipped with a neurotoxic substance that reacts for almost instantly upon contact with the air.

A mutated lump of necrotic flesh, horribly twisted into a spindy creature. A long, thick strand of contorted tissue protrudes from a gap you can only tell is its mouth. By the end of its lasher secretes a concentrated toxin.

A mutated lump of necrotic flesh, horribly twisted into a spindy creature. Its forelimbs form a pair of scythed blades, and its extra appendages writhe without a pause as they drip neurotoxins from its tip.

A mutated lump of necrotic flesh, horribly twisted into a spindy creature. Larger in its size, its excessive production of toxin has become its source in emitting a condensed fog, yet a cause to its unstable body.

//: Aggro-type zed who's revival can be a great nuisance to the target. An end-game prize.
description: A diluted zombie, staggering as its wicked eyes only show a vigorious expression to whom it looks at. One can easily take its life, but something inhumane lingers around this rotting vessel...

//: An OP version rises from killing the weakling! This zombie constantly becomes stronger after its revival, and if it gathers too much, one should stay away from getting a direct hit.
description: While in the verge of death, life has sprung again to bring wrath relentlessly. A skinless, brutal zombie constantly growing visible to its masculine body slowly gaining mass. Obscure to the limit of its growth, onee must execute this impending disaster.

//: Aggro-type zed. This zombie obtains various abilities and spells (from nature, etc.).
description: A zombie, nothing more special about it. Yet it is just a normal day walker, it is considered a lone wolf, shuffling its way into nothingness.

//: Stray with nature element. Tier 1 provides a subtle hint, to tell what element they are heading to.
description: A zombie, nothing more special about it. Yet it is just a normal day walker, it is considered a lone wolf, shuffling its way into nothingness. Vines are visible under its dress, but it doesn't seem to benefit nor bother the zed.
Heaps of vibrant vines and stems cover this stray's body, holding its rotten flesh in place. Nearly immobile, it is a peculiar sight to behold for one's curious mind.
Bound to the nature's grace, this stray has become one with the plant. Skin hardened like a bark, vines guides the undead's clumsy movements, but in search for flesh, the stray manipulates.

special_attacks.monster_message: %1$s slashes %3$s with its razor sharp leaves!

description: In its age, leaves, vines, everything, has grown larger and tougher. A stray, ascendant of nature, has cultivated some beautiful, yet strange blooming flowers.

special_attacks.monster_message: %1$s strikes the ground, then a wild outgrowth of vines and branches erupts under %3$s!

description: In every step it takes, befalls seducing spores from its coveted flowers. This almighty stray of nature, has succesfully ascended into a frightful vine beast.

special_attacks.monster_message:
%1$s strikes the ground, then a wild outgrowth of vines and branches erupts under %3$s!
Triffids burst out of it too!

description: A creeping animate plant, growing as tall as a moose.  It has a single bark-covered stalk supporting a flowery head with a paralyzing sting concealed within.
//: It must MELT, to prevent ppl farming for the precious vegan food.
Stray with acid element.
description: A zombie, nothing more special about it. Yet it is just a normal day walker, it is considered a lone wolf, shuffling its way into nothingness. A green-ish vein by its arm faintly glows.
Seeps in green-ish fluid, this stray - shambling as it walks - is defiled by its own blood.
Prolonged for too long from its acidic blood caused its skin to sag, but it has seemingly adapted to take hold of the harsh substance.
An acidic stray, now manipulates its own fluid to its will. Reeks in acid trail, it is determined to spread the corrosion along its aimless wandering.

special_attacks.monster_message: %1$s sends a large amount of concentrated acid to %3$s!

description: This corrosive stray, has finally ascended and developed an even and produces more lethal bodily fluid from aging, visibly gurgling on its bloated green-ish veins under the elastic, transparent skin.

special_attacks.monster_message: %1$s sends a massive glob of acid above %3$s, then explodes violently!

description: A giant amalgamation of flesh is cemented firmly into the floor and ceiling, preceded by the horrid miasma of putrid stenches emanating from the growth. The majority of the flesh binds into a central, knot-like growth that rhythmically pumps and undulates; similar to that of the heart of a horribly mutated creature.

special_attacks.description: The fleshknot sends out a cluster of tendrils!

description: A giant amalgamation of flesh is cemented firmly into the floor and ceiling, preceded by the horrid miasma of putrid stenches emanating from the growth. The majority of the flesh binds into a central, knot-like growth that rhythmically pumps and undulates; similar to that of the heart of a horribly mutated creature.

special_attacks.description: The fleshknot sends out a cluster of tendrils!

description: A giant amalgamation of flesh is cemented firmly into the floor and ceiling, preceded by the horrid miasma of putrid stenches emanating from the growth. The majority of the flesh binds into a central, knot-like growth that rhythmically pumps and undulates; similar to that of the heart of a horribly mutated creature.

special_attacks.description: The fleshknot sends out a cluster of tendrils!

description: A giant amalgamation of flesh is cemented firmly into the floor and ceiling, preceded by the horrid miasma of putrid stenches emanating from the growth. A somewhat humanoid figure is molded in the center of this abomination accompanied by large, membranous tentacles.

special_attacks.description: The fleshknot sends out a cluster of tendrils!

//: The core is exposed, so critical hits are available.
